reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Non lasciare che accada più. Migliorare la prevenzione e la risposta alla violenza contro le donne durante le elezioni

description.narrative: La terza fase del progetto di UN Women “Let it Not Happen Again” si focalizza, come le altre componenti, sulla prevenzione e la risposta alle violenze di genere. Questa fase risulta particolarmente rilevante in quanto si svolgerà nell’anno delle elezioni che si terranno ad agosto 2022. Il progetto ha come obiettivo principale quello di garantire l’accesso alla giustizia per le vittime di violenza di genere e rafforzare i meccanismi preventivi e di risposta alle stesse attraverso il miglioramento delle capacità delle autorità giudiziarie competenti, delle OSC e delle altre organizzazioni in difesa dei diritti umani, facendo tesoro delle lezioni apprese nelle prime due fasi di progetto.

Phase III of the UN Women project "Let it Not Happen Again" focuses on the preparedness and response to gender-based violence. This phase is particularly relevant as it takes place in the year of the elections (August 2022). The main objective of the project is to guarantee access to justice for gender-based violence survivors and to strengthen preventive and response mechanisms through the improvement of the capacities of the competent institutional authorities, CSOs and other organizations that work in defense of human rights, building on the lessons learned of the first two phases of the project.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
UNWOMEN - UNITED NATIONS ENTITY FOR GENDER EQUALITY AND THE EMPO

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls
Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
